column1: Mobile rates for deal-hunters on the go

The trivago app features deals on hotels that you can only access on your mobile device ‚Äî something all you deal-hunters out there won‚Äôt want to miss out on. Just search for your hotel like you normally would
column2: and keep an eye out for the ‚Äúmobile rate‚Äù badge to know when you‚Äôve found a special deal.

column1: Get a heads-up when prices drop

Have a trip coming up and want to try and book your stay for cheap? Now you can sign up for price drop alerts on the trivago app to stay on top of price changes for your favorite hotels. Instead of constant searching
column2: you‚Äôll get notified as soon as prices drop so you can act fast and get an awesome deal.

column1: Real talk from real guests
Along with always-updating price information
column2: the trivago app aggregates guest ratings from major booking sites to give you the best understanding of real-world experiences at each hotel. The trivago rating index creates a combined score of available ratings so that you can see what other guests have to say

I looked at the prices and it was 163.00 for the entire week and it did disclose you have to purchase mandatory car insurance. I did my due diligence and contacted Fox car rentals corporate office to find out how much the car insurance would be. The agent disclosed 16.99 per day. I was fine with that.

column1: Once we landed in Cabo and were conveniently shuttled to the car rental office we went inside and saw 3 agent podiums which two were in occupied while the third had two agents and an American citizen being swindled into some kind of transaction where they were pushing her to keep signing while we could hear her constantly ask them what she was signing. Big red flag. After 10 minutes the middle agent finally called us up and seemed annoyed that we were there. He pulled up my reservation and immediately started talking about insurance that it would be 1200.00 for the insurance since it was the holidays. I told them I talked to corporate and they disclosed the 16.99 per day mandatory insurance and that was it. They continued to argue and said it‚Äôs never that low and we must pay. The manager came over and backed up what he was saying. We were not going to pay that so we walked away. We realized there were several Americans standing outside that also walked away from their reservations because they didn‚Äôt want to get scammed either. It was annoying to try to get a ride and we tried to get an Uber but it‚Äôs illegal for Uber to operate at their airport.

We finally gave in and got into a taxi van and paid 90 bucks to get to our villa. We then uber around town and it costs us 5-6 bucks to get back to where we were staying. So it definitely worked out. But omg that experience at Fox car rental still has me feeling dirty and you should remove them from your site. Looking at all the reviews a lot of people are experiencing the same situation ! How about save your consumers the horrible experience and just don‚Äôt use them in Cabo! | Three months ago

column1: ‚óÜ New features & enhancements ‚óÜ
Offline mode is now available.
Faster loading of images on the Home Screen.
10 new activity icons.
Easily add custom items to the default lists with a long press in the packing list.
Icons are now grouped by category when adding a new list.
Renaming default list items is now available for Premium users.
‚óÜ Bug Fixes ‚óÜ
- Fixed minor issues with offline mode.
- Fixed item count when editing the packing lists.
- Fixed crash when adding/editing a List/Activity.
- Fixed ""Laundry"" button not displaying its correct active state.
- Fixed duplicating a trip to make an identical copy.
- Fixed Contact Us form not sending the message.
- Fixed crashing on Apple Silicon devices.
- Custom pictures can now be selected from the Photo gallery.
- Fixed renaming items in the packing list.
- Fixed trips not appearing for certain timezones.
- Fixed weather not loading correctly.
- Fixed printing of the packing list.
- Fixed TripIt connection.
- Fixed nearby attractions not showing up.
Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback keeps Packr engine running.

column1: We bought tickets that were titled ‚Äúdesert safari/camel caravan/sand boarding/atv and desert bbq‚Äù this was at a place called
Al Faqqa
It was a complete joke!! It was filthy to start. Second they said the ATV was extra and not included. Third the camel caravan was only sitting on a camel and walking to a photo opt.

The dune bashing was only through the sand to the camp and the sand surfing was not worth it. Instead of a half hour for each activity they expected you to just walk around the desert or buy things from them. This is not what we came for!

This was our last excursion and the one we were looking the most forward to in the UAE and it totally ruined it for us. What began as a trip of beauty and high respect for the people ended with us realizing there are scammers everywhere - do not fall for this one!!!
Al Faqqa is terrible and should be shut down.

column1: 1563250221;"com.atlasobscura.ios";"Atlas Obscura Travel Guide";"https://apps.apple.com/us/app/atlas-obscura-travel-guide/id1563250221?uo=4";"Find your adventurous spirit
column2: get off the beaten path and discover unique places to experience near and far
column3: all contributed by Atlas Obscura‚Äôs global community of explorers.

column1: EXPLORE THE MAP
We‚Äôve plotted the entire Atlas Obscura database in a single map
column2: allowing you to easily find unique places nearby or to help plan your next trip.

column1: GET THE BACKSTORY
Learn what makes each place so unique. Each entry has detailed information
column2: photos
column3: and tips from the community.

column1: PLAN & TRACK YOUR ADVENTURES
Create custom lists to organize your itinerary or bucket list. Also
column2: use the ‚ÄúBeen There‚Äù feature to track your progress exploring the wondrous world of Atlas Obscura.

column1: ADD YOUR DISCOVERIES
Contribute new places to be published in Atlas Obscura
column2: and share photos and tips from your travels with the community.

column1: BROWSE BY INTEREST
Explore Atlas Obscura by whatever fascinates you. From history and architecture to art and natural wonders
column2: get lost in the never-ending collection of off-the-beaten-path places.

column1: If you‚Äôre enjoying our app
column2: please take a moment to rate us in the app store. For bug reports or suggestions
column3: reach out at appfeedback@atlasobscura.com
column4: or visit us on Twitter at @atlasobscura where we‚Äôll report any major issues.

Its user-generated content brings to light the less trodden paths and uncovers sights and landmarks that traditional guides often overlook. This app is the epitome of adventure and discovery
column6: perfect for those yearning to explore beyond the ordinary.

column1: The interface of Atlas Obscura is intuitive
column2: making it easy to navigate through its vast network of wonders. Whether you‚Äôre a seasoned traveler or a curious explorer in your backyard
column3: the app tailors its discoveries to suit your location and interests. It‚Äôs like having a knowledgeable friend in your pocket
column4: always ready to show you something fascinating.

column1: One of the most striking features of Atlas Obscura is the diversity of its content. From awe-inspiring natural formations to quirky roadside attractions
column2: the app covers an eclectic mix of places that are both informative and entertaining. Each location is accompanied by detailed descriptions
column3: user reviews
column4: and often
column5: mesmerizing photographs that stir the wanderlust in you.

column1: Moreover
column2: the app fosters a sense of community among users. You can contribute by adding new locations
column3: sharing your experiences
column4: or offering tips
column5: which makes Atlas Obscura a living
column6: evolving atlas of the world‚Äôs wonders. This communal aspect adds depth to the app
column7: making it more than just a guide‚Äîit‚Äôs a platform for sharing and discovery.

column1: However
column2: it‚Äôs important to note that while Atlas Obscura opens the door to hidden gems
column3: some locations might require careful planning to visit. The app does a great job in providing essential information
column4: but it‚Äôs always wise to do additional research
column5: especially for remote or less accessible places.

column1: In conclusion
column2: Atlas Obscura is a treasure trove for adventurers and curious souls. It‚Äôs an invitation to step off the beaten path and plunge into a world of fascinating discoveries. For anyone looking to spice up their travels with unique
column3: offbeat destinations
column4: this app is a must-have. column1: FIND THE RIDE YOU WANT

column1: - Uber Green: Eco-Friendly

UPFRONT PRICING
With Uber

column1: SAFETY TOGETHER
Safety is a top priority at Uber. We have established comprehensive safety features to help ensure every rider and driver feels secure and comfortable.
AFFORDABLE PRICING
We‚Äôre doing all we can to make our pricing as transparent as possible.
- UberX Share: UberX Share connects you to other riders headed in the same direction.
- Group Rides: Share the journey with friends.
- Split Fare: Don‚Äôt worry about doing the math later‚Äîsplit the cost evenly while you‚Äôre still on the ride.
JOIN UBER ONE FOR EXCLUSIVE PERKS
Benefit from $0 Delivery Fee and up to 10% off eligible delivery and pickup orders
column2: 6% Uber Cash back on eligible rides and a $5 credit if our Latest Arrival Estimate on your order is off. Other fees & terms apply. For more details see uber.com/uberone.

column1: - But these are not all of the subscriptions! You can also subscribe to the search for air tickets from your city and catch cheap tickets for a plane that flies in the most unexpected direction. What a surprise!

- And the ""Price Map"" - in case you have not yet decided on your destination. The map shows both domestic and international flights.

column1: 380200364;"com.sapientgs.TSA";"MyTSA";"https://apps.apple.com/us/app/mytsa/id380200364?uo=4";"Named the Best Government Mobile App from the American Council for Technology and Industry Advisory Council
column2: and earning TSA recognition as one of the Top 15 Government IT Innovators
column3: ‚ÄúMyTSA‚Äù provides 24/7 access to information that passengers frequently request from TSA.

column1: With ‚ÄúMyTSA‚Äù
column2: you can:

column1: + Quickly search which items you can bring with you through the checkpoint onto the airplane.
+ Request live assistance from TSA through the AskTSA social media integration.
+ Check how historically busy the airport will be on your specific day and time of travel.
+ Check crowd-sourced TSA security checkpoints wait times at the airport of your choice.
+ Add your own TSA security checkpoints wait time for others to see (NOTE: You must be at the airport in order to report wait times).
+ Check the delay information and current weather conditions at your favorite airports nationwide.
+ Consult the TSA Guide on how to prepare for and get through the security checkpoint quickly.
+ Discover which airports and airlines support TSA PreCheck¬Æ
column2: and learn how to sign-up.";"https://is1-ssl.mzstatic.com/image/thumb/Purple116/v4/ce/3c/91/ce3c91ff-acb6-3e2e-11b2-6edbf1ab82f7/AppIcon-0-1x_U007emarketing-0-7-0-0-85-220-0.png/512x512bb.jpg";"[""Travel""

column1: 1312868007;"com.workaway.app";"Workaway Travel App";"https://apps.apple.com/us/app/workaway-travel-app/id1312868007?uo=4";"FIND HOSTS AROUND THE WORLD

column2: 000+ opportunities. 170 countries. 1 community.

column1: Use the Workaway travel app to stay with thousands of local host families in over 170 different countries around the world. Use your time during your travels to give back and support local communities by sharing your knowledge. Over 50
column2: 000+ available opportunities.

column1: App for verified travellers only (host app is coming soon!) Meet like minded travellers along the way
column2: and find a travel buddy to plan your new adventures with. Join our unique travel community and share amazing stories and ideas!

column1: TRAVEL GLOBALLY
column2: CONNECT LOCALLY

column1: Looking for a way to give meaning to your travels and give back? Workaway is the leading community for language learning
column2: cultural exchange
column3: working holidays and volunteering in over 170 countries. From volunteering with beach clean ups on a deserted island in the Pacific to helping teach at a local school in Mozambique... there are thousands of communities around the world looking for help in exchange for an immersive cultural experience. Learn about local food
column4: customs and traditions
column5: while living abroad like a local.

column1: KEY FEATURES:
* Search from over 50
column2: 000+ opportunities and connect with local hosts from around the world to swap your skills for food and accommodation or even earn a wage while exploring local life.

column1: * Find local active hosts around your current location on a map
column2: or near your future destinations

column1: * Quick access to your personalised favourite host list
* Message the hosts you are planning on visiting and keep in touch with them while on the move
* Contact last minute hosts for immediate volunteering opportunities
* Login from your phone whenever and wherever to easily manage and update your profile or apply on the move
* Read reviews from other members and contact them for travel advice
column2: tips
column3: or ask them about their stay with hosts

column1: * See other travellers near your current location or in the area you are planning on travelling to
* Chat and connect with like minded people and meet new friends along the way
* Find a travel buddy and connect your accounts to plan your next Workaway adventure
column2: visit hosts and apply together

column1: 1520656722;"gov.dhs.cbp.pspd.mpc";"Mobile Passport Control";"https://apps.apple.com/us/app/mobile-passport-control/id1520656722?uo=4";"Mobile Passport Control (MPC) is an official application created by U.S. Customs and Border Protection that streamlines your CBP processing experience at select U.S. entry locations. Simply fill out your traveler profile
column2: answer CBP inspection-related questions
column3: and proceed straight to the ‚ÄúMobile Passport Control‚Äù lane at the airport or seaport.

column1: MPC is a voluntary program which can be used by U.S. Citizens
column2: Canadian Citizen Visitors
column3: Lawful Permanent Residents
column4: and Visa Waiver Program Visitors at any of the supported airport and seaport locations found on our website: https://www.cbp.gov/travel/us-citizens/mobile-passport-control

column1: MPC provides a more efficient
column2: secure in-person inspection process for the CBP Officer and the traveler
column3: and shortens overall entry wait times.

column1: MPC can be used in 6 simple steps:

1. Create a traveler profile using biographic information from your passport; You can create a profile for all eligible members in a family group. Your profiles will be securely stored on your device completely free to be used for future travel.
2. Select your method of travel
column2: select your port of entry and terminal (if applicable)
column3: answer CBP inspection-related questions
column4: certify the truthfulness and accuracy of your answers
column5: and
column6: upon arriving at your selected port of entry
column7: tap the ‚ÄúSubmit Now‚Äù button.

column1: 3. Capture a clear and unobstructed photo of each traveler (including yourself) that you added to your submission.
4. Once your submission is processed
column2: CBP will send a virtual receipt back to your device.

column1: 5. Proceed to the MPC designated lane upon arrival and be prepared to present your passport and other relevant travel documents. Please note: MPC does not replace your passport; your passport will need to be presented to the CBP Officer.
6. The CBP Officer will complete the inspection. If further information is required
column2: the CBP Officer will let you know.";"https://is1-ssl.mzstatic.com/image/thumb/Purple112/v4/a9/95/89/a9958932-7ebc-c1bf-9858-f2a7bc804761/AppIcon-0-1x_U007ephone-0-0-0-0-sRGB-85-220-0.png/512x512bb.jpg";"[""Travel""]";"[""6003""]";"Travel";6003;"4+";"[""EN""

column1: The fine print: a HIDDEN-CITY flight is a flight where you get off at the layover rather than the final destination. For example
column2: a flight from New York to San Francisco might be $300
column3: but a similar flight from New York to Seattle with a layover in San Francisco might be $200. If you‚Äôre going to San Francisco we‚Äôll show you both flights
column4: and if you choose the cheaper one
column5: you get off the plane at the layover (San Francisco) rather than going to the final destination (Seattle).

column1: This is perfectly legal and the savings can be significant
column2: but if you‚Äôve never traveled like this before
column3: you should read our HIDDEN-CITY FAQ at¬†http://skiplagged.com/faq

column1: *** Webby Award Winner for Best Travel App 2022

column1: Ever curious about the deeper story behind that bronze historical marker you passed on the highway? Autio is an invitation to discover ‚Äî a hands-free experience that delights
column2: informs
column3: & entertains by fostering a deeper connection with the people
column4: places

column2: Phil Jackson

column1: NATIONWIDE COVERAGE ‚Äî Unique stories from coast-to-coast.

HOW IT WORKS
As you travel
column2: Autio serves up stories based on your geographic location & interests. The audio vignettes
column3: generally 2-3 minutes in length
column4: tell the history around you
column5: painting a multi-dimensional picture you‚Äôre unlikely to get from a history book or visitor's guide. Autio answers the questions we all ask as the odometer turns.

column1: ABOUT AUTIO
Humans are moved by stories. Stories that make us laugh and cry. They move us to come together and do amazing things. Since the dawn of time
column2: stories have been the way in which values and knowledge are passed from one generation to the next ‚Äî each adding their wisdom and experience along the way.

column1: Kiwi.com is a scam. All recent reviews suggest extremely problematic business practices. Their customer service support is intentionally dysfunctional to save them money and make changing your flight imposible. My friend and I bought tickets for a trip. They later changed our itinerary to leave and come back on completely different days from what we bought (and from each other). We both spent extra for ticket options where you are allowed to change your flights up to 48 hours before hand. We contacted them to change our flights entirely and they ended up putting me on hold and changing to my flight to something completely different from what I had asked. When I explained the correction they said we need to write to them with the details of the flight we want. We have done this at least 10 times back and forth. Each time they ‚Äúput in a request‚Äù which takes days to process and then they respond ‚Äúflight change not possible please enter new flight details‚Äù. This is despite us screenshoting the flight details directly from Kiwi.com‚Äôs site like they instructed us to do. I have asked for my case to be escalated to management a number of times which is also ignored. The fact of the matter is

column1: 1. Line 11 (Kakhovskaya-Kashirskaya) has been closed
2. Line 2 (Avtozavodskaya-Orekhovo) has been closed before spring
3. ZiL (PA) renamed to Tulskaya
4. Nizhniye Kotly (PA) renamed to Nagatinskaya
5. Kolomenskoye (PA) renamed to Varshavskaya
6. Belyaevo is located between Konkovo and Kaluzhskaya (6)
7. No line Kakhovskaya-Savyolovskaya (11)(Big circle line)
8. No line Savyolovskaya-Petrovsky Park (11)
9. Line Petrovsko-Razumovskaya - Seligerskaya has been opened (10)
10. Belomorskaya(2) and Shchukinskaya(RI) have been opened
11. Leningradskaya(RI) renamed to Streshnevo
12. Pokrovskoye-Streshnevo has been closed (RI)
13. NATI renamed to Likhobory (LE)
14. Severyanin renamed to Rostokino (YA)
15. Volokolamskaya(RI) has been opened
16. Slavyansky Bulvar(BE) has been opened

18. Karacharovo renamed to Nizhegorodskaya (GO)
19. Pechatniki is located between Lyiblino and Tekstilchiki (KU)
20. Novaya renamed to Aviamotornaya (KA)

22. Minskaya has been opened (KI)

column1: 1434284824;"com.travel-spend.app";"TravelSpend: Travel Budget App";"https://apps.apple.com/us/app/travelspend-travel-budget-app/id1434284824?uo=4";"TravelSpend is an app to track your spending while traveling the world. It's perfect for you if you are planning your next trip or are already on vacation. If you travel in a group you can share expenses with friends and family to see ‚Äúwho owes who.‚Äù
This app is for travelers like you - no matter if you are a solo traveler on a sabbatical
column2: a couple backpacking together or a group of friends on a weekend holiday.

column1: Try it now for free!
(unlimited free expenses)
TRACK YOUR TRAVEL EXPENSES
We designed TravelSpend specifically for travelers. It's quick and easy to use and works offline. You can add photos and spread expenses over multiple days.
STICK TO YOUR BUDGET
The app will help you keep track of your travel budget and to save money.
DON'T WORRY ABOUT CURRENCY EXCHANGE RATES
Add expenses in any currency. They will automatically convert to your home currency.
SHARE & SYNC
Invite friends or family and organize your budget together. Your data syncs in real-time across multiple devices.
SPLIT COSTS
Share your trip with your partner or a group of friends and keep track of who owes whom. Split bills
column2: check your balances and settle debts all within TravelSpend.

column1: GAIN INSIGHTS FROM YOUR SPENDING
See your spending data visualized. You'll be able to analyze your spending so you can avoid overspending.
EXPORT YOUR DATA
To create expense reports you can easily export your spending data to a CSV file anytime.

You can use the app free of charge forever. Some functionality can be activated by purchasing the ‚ÄúPremium‚Äù version.
